## Collider {.unnumbered} ::: {.cell hash='confounding3_cache/html/setup_23cc31283cea6ce95d60e8c614c3bebd'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load required packages library(simcausal) ``` ::: Let us consider - L is continuous variable - A is binary treatment - Y is continuous outcome ### Non-null effect - True treatment effect = 1.3 #### Data generating process ::: {.cell hash='confounding3_cache/html/dgm3_fa5d7bdd42ac56ab43c1e8956f10a9e7'} ```{.r .cell-code} D <- DAG.empty() D <- D + node("A", distr = "rbern", prob = plogis(-10)) + node("Y", distr = "rnorm", mean = 1.3 * A, sd = .1) + node("L", distr = "rnorm", mean = 10 * Y + 1.3 * A, sd = 1) Dset <- set.DAG(D) ``` ::: #### Generate DAG ::: {.cell hash='confounding3_cache/html/dag3_de96ab10b5d14b2026ad36247a4ce8de'} ```{.r .cell-code} plotDAG(Dset, xjitter = 0.1, yjitter = .9, edge_attrs = list(width = 0.5, arrow.width = 0.4, arrow.size = 0.7), vertex_attrs = list(size = 12, label.cex = 0.8)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](confounding3_files/figure-html/dag3-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### Generate data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} require(simcausal) Obs.Data <- sim(DAG = Dset, n = 1000000, rndseed = 123) head(Obs.Data) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #### Estimate effect ::: {.cell hash='confounding3_cache/html/est3_1a7ae2d5923545e90553634f846e6273'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Not adjusted for L fit0 <- glm(Y ~ A, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit0),2) #> (Intercept) A #> 0.00 1.29 # Adjusted for L fit <- glm(Y ~ A + L, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit),2) #> (Intercept) A L #> 0.00 0.58 0.05 ``` ::: ### Null effect - True treatment effect = 0 #### Data generating process ::: {.cell hash='confounding3_cache/html/dgm4_c1c896a7724a6f6caa101454f48d9e46'} ```{.r .cell-code} D <- DAG.empty() D <- D + node("A", distr = "rbern", prob = plogis(-10)) + node("Y", distr = "rnorm", mean = 0, sd = .1) + node("L", distr = "rnorm", mean = 10 * Y + 1.3 * A, sd = 1) Dset <- set.DAG(D) ``` ::: #### Generate DAG ::: {.cell hash='confounding3_cache/html/dag4_3640eee82398c43fad568e0a8ba2f0a8'} ```{.r .cell-code} plotDAG(Dset, xjitter = 0.1, yjitter = .9, edge_attrs = list(width = 0.5, arrow.width = 0.4, arrow.size = 0.7), vertex_attrs = list(size = 12, label.cex = 0.8)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](confounding3_files/figure-html/dag4-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### Generate data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} require(simcausal) Obs.Data <- sim(DAG = Dset, n = 1000000, rndseed = 123) head(Obs.Data) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #### Estimate effect ::: {.cell hash='confounding3_cache/html/est4_5705136f7c7ef94962b1d11d50a2f38a'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Not adjusted for L fit0 <- glm(Y ~ A, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit0),2) #> (Intercept) A #> 0.00 -0.01 # Adjusted for L fit <- glm(Y ~ A + L, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit),2) #> (Intercept) A L #> 0.00 -0.07 0.05 ``` ::: Even 1,000,000 observations were not enough to recover true treatment effect! But we are close enough.
